short: I have been a software developer for almost 3 years working with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Ruby on Rails and React. I help companies build and improve the performance of their web apps.
long: I have been a software developer for almost 3 years working with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Ruby on Rails and React, I help companies build and improve the performance of their web apps. In the last 2 years, I have worked with two companies to build web apps from dashboards that has more than 5000 users to web apps that is accessed by more than 100,000 people. My strength is building beautiful, scalable and performant web apps. What I am looking for is a company I can add value to where I can join a strong team.
